rvv..this is not gonna fetch u anything..do what u wanna do..well go on reverting u...finally u will be blocked from editing wikipedia

/* Transport */ changed intro to eliminate any objections. In every city people walk, this section is about public transport.
removed Mastercard survey results because these are not a common benchmark
no need to mention "according to United Nations."
some editors seem to have a fight whether it is the 1st or 2nd largest city proper. UN statistics are more comparable than city proper statistics so replaced it the UN study.

reverted Nikkul, see talk page. he keeps reintroducing his opinion about transport (now without "most"), while removing citation needed tags and the WCOC study fixes. if housing is problem, remove it.
reverted edits by user lilit. Don't revert additions and quote another reason.
changed to original source and overall ranking in commerce, gdp
